price: Денгиздаги тоғлар каби юрувчи қурилмалар ҳам Уникидир.
arabic: وَلَهُ ٱلۡجَوَارِ ٱلۡمُنشَـَٔاتُ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ كَٱلۡأَعۡلَٰمِ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walahu al-jawāri al-munshaātu fī al-baḥri kal-aʿlāmi
